remarks: Existence of a class abstraction of existentially restricted sets. ` x ` is normally a free-variable parameter in ` B ` .  The antecedent assures us that ` A ` is a set.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2003.)
statement:
abrexexg $p |- ( A e. V -> { y | E. x e. A y = B } e. _V ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B y $.
